docs.snippet: THE Office of Defense Transportation will be no more lenient toward pleasure travel this winter, it is said, than it was last. Travel, in fact, is to be restricted, so far as possible, to those who must get away for reasons of health or business o...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE Office of Defense Transportation will be no more lenient toward pleasure travel this winter, it is said, than it was last. Travel, in fact, is to be restricted, so far as possible, to those who must get away for reasons of health or business or in the interest of the war effort.
